title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hamas HQ at Khan Yunis School: Precision Attack Explained”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terrorists who were in the compound of a school in Khan Yunis, which served as a headquarters for Hamas militants from where they coordinated terrorist activities against our forces.

Air force aircraft, under the direction of Southern Command, targeted terrorists in the compound of the “Al Hassan” school in the Khan Yunis area. The school served as a headquarters for the terrorist organization Hamas, from which Hamas militants planned, directed, and executed numerous terrorist plots against our forces operating in the Gaza Strip.

The attack was carefully planned and executed, using precision munitions and avoiding harm to non-involved individuals as much as possible.

Attached are photos from the forces’ operations in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC27062024754785478
